channel.title: Game Freezes on "Loading, please wait."
channel.description:
I'm able to sucessfully log into my server, but after that when I get to the "Loading, please wait." page, it doesn't load up the game, it just freezes. My run.bat said this:
Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 50974. Client type: high memory version UserId: whatever the userid was I forgot N00b is signing onto the server. LOADED: 3 Game saved for player N00b ClientHandler: Client N00b disconnected.
Any way to fix that?

item.title: Game Freezes on "Loading, please wait."
item.dc:creator: @burnt_w_pwnt burnt w pwnt
item.description:
@burnt_w_pwnt wrote:

Some thing is wrong with ur cache, i suggest u shud get a new client or get another cache.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Freezes on "Loading, please wait."
item.dc:creator: @Da_0wnz Da 0wnz
item.description:
@Da_0wnz wrote:

It’s because you don’t have the client cache needed to play the client. Very simple error. Ask the owner of the client if he can send you over the client. Then add the cache folder by going to My Computer then open up Local Disk (C:) then simply just paste the cache folder in local disk. After that, run your client and it should work pro. Hope I helped ;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2009, 11:02:13 am[/size][hr]Hmm… Now that I’m reading this again… It might be the cache but when this happened to me it didn’t freeze I’ll work on it for ya.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Freezes on "Loading, please wait."
item.dc:creator: @Agent766 Agent766
item.description:
@Agent766 wrote:

[quote=“Aeolian., post:5, topic:288047”]Wow, you just bumped a topic from 10 days ago.

Grave digging much?[/quote]

lol at least give him credit for using the search button. Anyway, I get this too only when making a new account. Then I just restart the client and log in with the same information and then it works.

Read full topic

item.title: Game Freezes on "Loading, please wait."
item.dc:creator: @Total_N00b Total N00b
item.description:
@Total_N00b wrote:

I’m able to sucessfully log into my server, but after that when I get to the “Loading, please wait.” page, it doesn’t load up the game, it just freezes.
My run.bat said this:

Connection accepted from 127.0.0.1: 50974.
Client type: high memory version
UserId: whatever the userid was I forgot
N00b is signing onto the server.
LOADED: 3
Game saved for player N00b
ClientHandler: Client N00b disconnected.

Any way to fix that?
